nodes.text: The VL-18 Plasma Rifle was a model of plasma blaster rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The VL-18 Plasma Rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Outer Rim Explorer's Pack, which was released to the Cartel Market on July 22, 2015.
